author: الوطن
title: Ground News - “Homeland” inside the house of Hilmi Bakr.. The musician cried: “I can't walk”
text:
Summary by الوطن The great Egyptian composer Helmy Bakr is currently at home in a state of severe fatigue and in a very poor state of health after being released a few days ago from a hospital in the Dokki and Muhan area Share menu More
